MiAgent DIFFERENCE VS COMPETITORS

# Highlight Features Detailed Description Key Differentiation
1 Product Image Recognition & Processing • Send and analyze images directly in chat.
• AI automatically recognizes customer images to identify products of interest.		• Most platforms only support text chat.
• MiAgent understands images like humans, allowing customers to just snap a photo for AI to identify and consult correctly.
2 Video Content Understanding & Analysis • Allows sending product videos in chat.
• AI can understand, extract content, and analyze customer videos.		• Competitors rarely handle video.
• MiAgent analyzes both content and emotion in videos to determine customer interest or issues.
3 Intent Understanding & Natural Context • Accurately identifies customer intent and replies only with sufficient context.
• AI inherits full conversation history to continue consulting seamlessly like a human.		• Competitors often lose context when switching agents or when customers return days later.
• MiAgent keeps the flow intact, making the experience more natural and professional.
4 System Connection & Full Sales Automation • Integrates CRM, ERP, Facebook, Zalo OA, Shopee, Amazon, TikTok Shop, Spotify…
• Smart Remarketing: auto-send care messages based on buying behavior, alert staff on bad signals.		• While others stop at customer support chatbots,
• MiAgent acts as an AI Sales System – automating the entire sales chain, from interaction, analysis to closing.

MiAgent helps businesses automate processes and serve customers quickly
